mapper.select: SELECT EVENT.EVENT_ID, EVENT.S_ID, EVENT.POST_TYPE_ID, EVENT.EVENT_IMG_ID, EVENT.SIGUNGU_ID, RECRUIT_TYPE.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, EVENT.EVENT_STATUS_ID, STATUS.EVENT_STATUS, EVENT.EVENT_NAME, EVENT.EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, EVENT.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, EVENT.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, EVENT.EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT.EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, EVENT.EVENT_ADDR, EVENT.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, EVENT.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type recruit_type ON (event.event_recruit_type_id = recruit_type.event_recruit_type_id) INNER JOIN event_status status ON (event.event_status_id = status.event_status_id) WHERE event.event_status_id IN (3 , 5) ORDER BY event.event_date_created DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.S_ID, E.POST_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_IMG_ID, E.SIGUNGU_ID, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE, E.EVENT_STATUS_ID, S.EVENT_STATUS, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_CONTENT, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, E.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type R ON (E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN event_status S ON (E.EVENT_STATUS_ID = S.EVENT_STATUS_ID) WHERE EVENT_ID = #{eventId} ORDER BY EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE DESC

SELECT EVENT_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, EVENT_IMG_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_STATUS_ID, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_DATE_CREATED, EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT EVENT_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, EVENT_IMG_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_STATUS_ID, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_DATE_CREATED, EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_START_DATE BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT EVENT_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, EVENT_IMG_ID, SIGUNGU_ID, EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, EVENT_STATUS_ID, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_CONTENT, EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, EVENT_DATE_CREATED, EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, EVENT_START_DATE, EVENT_END_DATE, EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT WHERE EVENT_DATE_CREATED BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchDTO.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s.%f') LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.S_ID, E.POST_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_IMG_ID, E.SIGUNGU_ID, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_STATUS_ID, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, E.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type R ON (E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN event_status S ON (E.EVENT_STATUS_ID = S.EVENT_STATUS_ID) WHERE E.EVENT_STATUS_ID IN (3, 5) AND E.SIGUNGU_ID = #{searchDTO.sigungu} UNION SELECT E.EVENT_ID, E.S_ID, E.POST_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_IMG_ID, E.SIGUNGU_ID, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID, E.EVENT_STATUS_ID, E.EVENT_NAME, E.EVENT_THUMBNAIL_IMG, E.EVENT_DATE_CREATED, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_START_DATE, E.EVENT_END_DATE, E.EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE, E.EVENT_ADDR, E.EVENT_FAVORITE_CNT, E.EVENT_VIEW_CNT FROM EVENT E INNER JOIN event_recruitment_type R ON (E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = R.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN event_status S ON (E.EVENT_STATUS_ID = S.EVENT_STATUS_ID) WHERE E.EVENT_STATUS_ID IN (3, 5) AND E.EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = #{searchDTO.theme}) ORDER BY EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE DESC LIMIT #{perPagePostNo} OFFSET #{startPostNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT VALUES (NULL, #{sId}, #{postTypeId}, #{eventImgId}, #{sigunguId}, #{eventRecruitTypeId}, #{eventStatusId}, #{eventName}, #{eventContent}, NULL, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, TO_DATE(#{eventRecruitStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{eventRecruitEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{eventStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{eventEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{eventMaxPeople}, #{eventAddr}, #{eventFavoriteCnt}, #{eventViewCnt})
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET SIGUNGU_ID = #{sigunguId}, EVENT_RECRUIT_TYPE_ID = #{eventRecruitTypeId}, EVENT_STATUS_ID = #{eventStatusId}, EVENT_NAME = #{eventName}, EVENT_CONTENT = #{eventContent}, EVENT_RECRUIT_START_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{eventRecruitStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), EVENT_RECRUIT_END_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{eventRecruitEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), EVENT_START_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{eventStartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), EVENT_END_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{eventEndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), EVENT_MAX_PEOPLE = #{eventMaxPeople}, EVENT_ADDR = #{eventAddr} WHERE EVENT_ID = #{eventId} AND S_ID = #{sId}
